name: Two Kids Stacked On Top of Each Other In A Trench Coat Pretending To Be An Adult
name_original: Two Kids Stacked On Top of Each Other In A Trench Coat Pretending To Be An Adult
description:
What is our game?

  • A two-player cooperative puzzle-platformer game. Each player controls a kid and both players can stack on top of each other and disguise themselves as an adult, effectively combining into a single character. When disguised/combined, one player controls movement and the other controls everything else.
  • Each of the two kids has their own unique skill set and the disguised form differs depending on which player is stacked on top or bottom. Each character form/variation may react differently to different obstacles, so changing between them will be necessary for completing levels.

Our Team!

Gameplay: Andy Chan, Manyu Wang , Murtaza Latif, Wei Cui

Audio: Josh Sparks, Janise Ku

Art: Logan Hyde, Mandy Luu, Adriana Lee
